Name: Namespace Validations
Description: Rules to make sue the correct namespace is being used

Rules.Name: Course Level Characteristic descriptor wrong namespace
Rules.Sql:
SELECT  LocalCourseCode,
	schoolId EducationOrganizationId,
	SchoolYear,
	SessionNAme,
	descriptor.namespace,
	CodeValue CourseLevelCharacteristic
FROM edfi.CourseOfferingCourseLevelCharacteristic 
JOIN Edfi.descriptor 
	on descriptorid = CourseLevelCharacteristicDescriptorId 
WHERE descriptor.namespace not like 'uri://ed-fi.org/CourseLevelCharacteristicDescriptor'

Rules.Name: Course Level Characteristic descriptor wrong namespace
Rules.Sql:
SELECT  EducationOrganizationId,
	CourseCode,
	CodeValue CourseLevelCharacteristic,
	descriptor.namespace
FROM edfi.CourseLevelCharacteristic 
JOIN Edfi.descriptor 
	on descriptorid = CourseLevelCharacteristicDescriptorId 
WHERE descriptor.namespace not like 'uri://ed-fi.org/CourseLevelCharacteristic%';

Rules.Name: Homeless Program Association descriptor wrong namespace
Rules.Sql:
SELECT  EducationOrganizationId, 
	 ProgramName,
	 StudentUniqueId,
descriptor.namespace,
	 CodeValue HomelessProgramService
FROM edfi.StudentHomelessProgramAssociationHomelessProgramService 
JOIN Edfi.descriptor 
	on descriptorid = HomelessProgramServiceDescriptorId 
JOIN Edfi.Student
	on student.studentUSI = StudentHomelessProgramAssociationHomelessProgramService.StudentUSI
WHERE descriptor.namespace not like 'uri://ed-fi.org/HomelessProgramServiceDescriptor';

Rules.Name: Limited English descriptor wrong namespace
Rules.Sql:
SELECT  StudentUniqueId,
	EducationOrganizationId,
	descriptor.namespace,
	CodeValue  LimitedEnglishProficiency
FROM edfi.StudentEducationOrganizationAssociation

	on descriptorid = LimitedEnglishProficiencyDescriptorId 
JOIN Edfi.Student

WHERE descriptor.namespace not like 'uri://ed-fi.org/LimitedEnglishProficiencyDescriptor';
